alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 9:25AM EST until January 12 at 10:15AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Bracken County in northern Kentucky... Pendleton County in northern Kentucky... South central Clermont County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 1015 AM EST. * At 925 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Williamstown, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Falmouth, Butler, Morgan, Moscow, Neville, Chilo, Mount Auburn, Browning Corner, Willow Grove, Bradford, Gardnersville, Powersville, Peach Grove, Ivor, Johnsville, Goforth, Woolcutt, Neave, Milford and Greenwood. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
